description: Kerbal Space Program was released in 2015 for Windows, Mac, and Linux platforms. The gameplay revolves around developing a space program for aliens called "Kerbals," and includes designing and flying spacecraft.

KSP utilizes MU files to store 3D models for space shuttles. The MU files are accompanied by part.cfg files, which reference the MU files as a mesh. There are also .MBM files referenced by the MU file that contain the textures for the model.
NOTE: KSP models are typically built with Unity modeling software.

common_filenames.description: model.mu - The 3D model mesh file used by Kerbal Space Program.
